title: Visiting Hours
description: Based on the horror film starring Lee Grant, William Shatner, Michael Ironside and Linda Purl and directed by Jean-Claude Lord.Colt Hawker hates outspoken, agressive women because they remind him of his mother, who wasn't nice to his daddy.Deborah Ballin reminds him of his mother, and he's going to kill her. And he believes, if at first you don't succeed, try, try again...
author: Kent Rembo
